name: Last Stage: The Story of a Planet
name_original: Last Stage: The Story of a Planet
description:
Last Stage is an action game in which you defeat hordes of strange creatures, known as Menaces, who attack you with energy beams. 

You can meet your friends in between stages, and the story diverges based on the strength of your relationships with the various characters.

Languages: 日本語, 繁體中文(未完成)
